nodes.text: Stealth suits were a type of gray-colored clothing used by individuals wanting to go unseen. When the crime lord Papa Toren had the smuggler Lando Calrissian put together a team to steal Galactic Emperor Sheev Palpatine's pleasure craft, the Imperialis, from Sienar Fleet Systems Orbital Shipyard CC-24, he provided them with stealth suits. During the heist, all five members of the team—Calrissian, his partner the cyborg Lobot, the antiques expert Korin Pers and the partners Aleksin and Pavol—wore stealth suits, allowing them to get close to the starship so Lobot could use his AJ^6 cyborg construct to disable the station's security which would let the team to successfully steal the ship.
Stealth suits first appeared in the comic book Lando 1, which was released in 2015, written by Charles Soule and illustrated by Alex Maleev.
